body: I, as many others, Love village and have played it alot, and this question keeps popping in my head, Who is G_SKIPPY, I never see him play, and I dont see him on the forums, did he quit the server, or hes too busy??
body_tagged: I, as many others, Love village and have played it alot, and this question keeps popping in my head, Who is G_SKIPPY, I never see him play, and I dont see him on the forums, did he quit the server, or hes too busy??
title: Who is G_SKIPPY

replies.body:
He used to be an old Mc-Zone Moderator and Map Builder.
Some maps he created
Nebula:
Ternio
Quintus
Venomous

Walls:
The Village

I can only think of those maps atm, but he retired and left, as his profile says, he will come on and play once in a while

replies.body:
Thought Haribo made Ternio? :P

G_SKIPPY is a retired Staff Member and has made maps for Avicus/MCZone.

He has made the following maps from Nebula off the top of my head:

Quintus, Crusade, Titans, Venomous, Fissura and Luar.

replies.body:
Speaking of G_SKIPPY, all of his map names have something In common.
Im taking Latin this year and came across a Roman name of Quintus.

Also a good guy <3
Fun to talk to :3

replies.body:
Quintus means "fifth" I believe, there are 5 monuments, same with Ternio, meaning third, or something along the lines of that, same with it having 3 monuments...
:]

replies.body:
G_SKIPPY was an old Moderator and Map Maker of MCZone.
Maps he made are: Crusade, Decay, Divines (CTW), Fissura, Haze, Luar, Quintus, Rapture, Titans, Venomous DTM, Venomous TDM and Village.
replies.body_tagged:
G_SKIPPY was an old Moderator and Map Maker of MCZone.
Maps he made are: Crusade, Decay, Divines (CTW), Fissura, Haze, Luar, Quintus, Rapture, Titans, Venomous DTM, Venomous TDM and Village.

replies.body:
"Five" in Latin is "Quinque"
"Quintus" is a Roman name for guys

"Three" in Latin is "Tres"
I dont know where Ternio is from though.

But I can see where the 5 monuments and the 3 monuments came from though. In fact, it only makes sense if you put it that way.
replies.body_tagged:
